dcterms:creator: P. S. Leon
S. A. Knock
A. Spiegler
V. K. Jirsa
dcterms:description: The Virtual Brain (TVB) is a simulator designed for primate brain network dynamics, allowing for the simulation, analysis, and inference of neurophysiological mechanisms across different brain scales.
dcterms:title: The Virtual Brain (TVB)

dcterms:creator: P. S. Sanz-Leon
S. A. Knock
A. Spiegler
V. K. Jirsa
dcterms:description: Julich-Brain probabilistic cytoarchitectonic maps provide a microstructural reference parcellation for brain modeling, specifically used in the context of the BEI model.
dcterms:title: Julich-Brain probabilistic cytoarchitectonic maps

dcterms:description: The Desikan parcellation is a widely used brain parcellation scheme that divides the cerebral cortex into regions based on anatomical landmarks.
dcterms:title: Desikan parcellation

dcterms:description: CNT_S01_structure is a dataset used in the example code, likely containing structural connectivity information for brain modeling.
dcterms:title: CNT_S01_structure

dcterms:description: The 5-HT2A receptor density map is used in the BEI model to incorporate the effects of serotonin receptor distribution on brain dynamics.
dcterms:title: 5-HT2A receptor density map

dcterms:creator: R. B. Buxton
L. R. Frank
dcterms:description: The Balloon-Windkessel model is used for generating BOLD signals in fMRI studies, modeling the relationship between cerebral blood flow and oxygen metabolism during neural stimulation.
dcterms:title: Balloon-Windkessel model

dcterms:creator: E. A. Allen
et al.
dcterms:description: Functional Connectivity Dynamics (FCD) refers to the temporal fluctuations in functional connectivity between brain regions during resting state fMRI.
dcterms:title: Functional Connectivity Dynamics (FCD)

dcterms:creator: M. di Volo
A. Romagnoni
C. Capone
A. Destexhe
dcterms:description: The mean-field AdEx model is a biologically realistic model of conductance-based networks of spiking neurons with adaptation, used for simulating neural dynamics.
dcterms:title: Mean-field AdEx model

dcterms:creator: E. Montbrió
D. Pazó
A. Roxin
dcterms:description: The FRE model provides a macroscopic description for networks of spiking neurons, focusing on the collective dynamics of large populations.
dcterms:title: FRE model
